title: The Other Innkeeper
description:
Our story tonight is called The Other Innkeeper and it’s a story about a memory and the path it lays out. It’s also about a card waiting to fall into the right hands, creaking hallway floors and the end of something that may actually be a beginning.

So get cozy and ready to sleep.

Buy the book now yperurl.co/NothingMuchHappens

For a spookified version of this episode go to https://www.nothingmuchhappens.com/extra-stuff

Get our ad-free and bonus episodes here: https://nothingmuchhappens.supportingcast.fm

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
